title: Job-Relevant Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computation skills and workplace data application experience
context.additional_context: Establishing integrated online-offline learning environments using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Improvement of job-related mathematical problem-solving skills by over 80% in blended learning environments.
Monitoring the learning process at least three times using a self-assessment tool based on the CIPP model.
Acquiring the ability to provide and receive peer feedback in team-based blended learning.
Completing one data analysis project by integrating an online learning platform with offline workshops.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
